name: 2D Zombie Survival (itch)
description:
**Version 0.2.0.1 Alpha Available!**

Welcome to 2D Zombies! Yes the name say's it all, its good old fashion zombies in 2D. Its a zombie survival game with an infinite amount of waves that gets progressively harder the more you play. the goal is to survive as long as possible, with only the guns available to you. This is my first game in unity, and I'm excited to keep developing it to fully release it one day.

Whats in the game so far?

There's a lot i want to add to this game, for example, multiplayer, power ups, more guns, more zombie types, etc.. but there's already quite a bit of content in the game already for you to play with. But here's whats already in the game:

Guns
  • BAR
  • Bren LMG
  • M1911
  • DP 98
  • Enfield NO.2
  • Gewehr
  • M1 Grand
  • MG 42
  • MP 40
  • PPSH 41
  • Sten
  • STG 44
  • SVT-40
  • Thompson
  • Tokarev TT-33
  • Type 99 LMG
  • Walther P38
Zombies
  • Basic Zombie
    • more comming soon..
Maps
  • Abandoned Building
    • more comming soon...
Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aiming
  • Left Mouse - Shooting
  • R - Reload
  • Tab - Score Menu
  • E - Buy Gun/ Door
  • Z/X - Zoom camera in and out
  • Escape - Pause Menu
  • Mouse Wheel - Switching Weapons
